column5: Hit a local pond over the past couple of day's and just thought I'd share the excitment....
WTG. some nice craps there fur sur. Gotta luv first ice eh! Thanks fur sharing.
NICE - must've been before we got all this rain....I'm just 45mins down the road from st. thomas and my back-yard pond isn't even frozen over.  good job dude, UF
I was out today too.  5" of ice in most places, with about an inch of wet soft ice that will freeze up nice tonight..
Great report and pics iceslayer  Good looking crappies for sure Thanks for sharing Leechman
You and that reservoir dude.. always has the first ice. No fair!!  Nice crappies!
SWEET !!!  Literally. Nice delicate, white, sweet, tasty meat on those little critters.
